title: Sandra Bullock adopts baby girl
text: ‘It was the least I could do’ 8:22 AM Alison Stephenson WHILE most women wouldn’t dream of shaving their head, Toni Collette has done it five times, but none has meant more to her than her latest bald appearance. Telstra on ‘go slow’ for Apple users 8:17 AM Rod Chester National technology writer TELSTRA customers with Apple devices have taken to social media after a network glitch turned the last few days into a dismal internet crawl. Big Bang Theory: Mayim Bialik talks Amy’s future 8:03 AM Staff Writers SPOILER ALERT: Bialik has a few ideas in mind for the future of The Big Bang Theory, specifically what will happen between Amy and Sheldon. Why Instagram banned the nipple 7:51 AM Network Writers MILEY Cyrus has been open in her support of #freethenipple campaign, but now Instagram has revealed why it bans female nipples. Tom Hanks’ son: ‘My nose was clogged from coke’ 7:07 AM Staff Writers IN A SERIES of Instagram videos, 25-year-old Chet Hanks has confirmed he’s been in rehab for cocaine addiction. Beau apologises over ‘affair’ scandal 6:54 AM Robbie Patterson FORMER footballer Beau Ryan used his ­appearance on The Footy Show to publicly apologise for the controversy over allegations he had an affair. Schumer shows off tennis chops 5:32 AM Network Writers MOVE over Serena Williams. Amy Schumer has shared an adorable ‘throwback’ to a time when she ripped up the tennis courts.
